main event: A reddish and orange object was observed in the sky from Fairview, New Jersey on September 15, 1956.
interesting points: The object was described as pin-sized at arm's length and was seen to both stand still and increase in size at times., The object was observed moving west slowly., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., Observations were made both visually and through binoculars., The conclusions from various sources leaned towards the object being a balloon.
sighted object: reddish and orange object in the sky
witness description: Civilian observation with shared opinions about the object's nature.
